acl.extend_sender_acl: Allow to extend sender ACL by external addresses

add.activate_filter_warn: 활성화가 체크되어 있으면 모든 다른 필터들은 비활성화됩니다.
add.alias_address_info: 완전한 이메일 주소를 입력하거나 @example.com과 같이 입력하여 이 도메인으로 오는 모든 메일을 받도록 할 수 있습니다. (쉼표로 구분). 메일카우 도메인만 입력할 수 있습니다..
add.automap: 자동으로 폴더 연결 시도하기 ("Sent items", "Sent" => "Sent" 등등)
add.comment_info: 비공개 메모는 사용자에게 보이지 않지만, 공개 메모는 사용자 개요에서 툴팁 형태로 볼 수 있습니다.
add.custom_params_hint: 올바른 설정: --param=xy, 올바르지 않은 설정: --param xy
add.delete2: 원래 있는 곳에 있지 않는 메일을 도착지에서 삭제
add.gal_info: The GAL contains all objects of a domain and cannot be edited by any user. Free/busy information in SOGo is missing, if disabled! Restart SOGo to apply changes.
add.post_domain_add:
새 도메인을 추가한 후 SOGo 컨테이너 ("sogo-mailcow") 를 재시작해야 합니다!

또한, 도메인의 DNS 설정도 다시 확인하는 것이 좋습니다. DNS 설정이 승인되면, "acme-mailcow" 를 재시작해서 새 도메인의 인증서를 자동으로 발급받을 수 있습니다. (autoconfig.<domain>, autodiscover.<domain>).
이 단계는 선택 사항이며, 24시간마다 재시도합니다.
add.relay_all_info: ↪ If you choose not to relay all recipients, you will need to add a ("blind") mailbox for every single recipient that should be relayed.
add.relay_transport_info:
Info
You can define transport maps for a custom destination for this domain. If not set, a MX lookup will be made.
add.relay_unknown_only: Relay non-existing mailboxes only. Existing mailboxes will be delivered locally.
add.relayhost_wrapped_tls_info:
Please do not use TLS-wrapped ports (mostly used on port 465).
Use any non-wrapped port and issue STARTTLS. A TLS policy to enforce TLS can be created in "TLS policy maps".
add.skipcrossduplicates: 폴더들의 중복 메세지 건너뛰기 (first come, first serve)

admin.add_relayhost_hint: Please be aware that authentication data, if any, will be stored as plain text.
admin.add_transports_hint: Please be aware that authentication data, if any, will be stored as plain text.
admin.api_allow_from: Allow API access from these IPs/CIDR network notations
admin.api_info: The API is a work in progress. The documentation can be found at /api
admin.ays: Are you sure you want to proceed?
admin.ban_list_info:
See a list of banned IPs below: network (remaining ban time) - [actions].
IPs queued to be unbanned will be removed from the active ban list within a few seconds.
Red labels indicate active permanent bans by blacklisting.
admin.credentials_transport_warning: Warning: Adding a new transport map entry will update the credentials for all entries with a matching nexthop column.
admin.dkim_from_title: Source domain to copy data from
admin.f2b_list_info: A blacklisted host or network will always outweigh a whitelist entity. List updates will take a few seconds to be applied.
admin.f2b_netban_ipv4: IPv4 subnet size to apply ban on (8-32)
admin.f2b_netban_ipv6: IPv6 subnet size to apply ban on (8-128)
admin.forwarding_hosts_add_hint: You can either specify IPv4/IPv6 addresses, networks in CIDR notation, host names (which will be resolved to IP addresses), or domain names (which will be resolved to IP addresses by querying SPF records or, in their absence, MX records).
admin.forwarding_hosts_hint: Incoming messages are unconditionally accepted from any hosts listed here. These hosts are then not checked against DNSBLs or subjected to greylisting. Spam received from them is never rejected, but optionally it can be filed into the Junk folder. The most common use for this is to specify mail servers on which you have set up a rule that forwards incoming emails to your mailcow server.
admin.hash_remove_info:
Removing a ratelimit hash (if still existing) will reset its counter completely.
Each hash is indicated by an individual color.
admin.help_text: Override help text below login mask (HTML allowed)
admin.include_exclude_info: By default - with no selection - all mailboxes are addressed
admin.license_info:
A license is not required but helps further development.
Register your GUID here or buy support for your mailcow installation.
admin.logo_info: Your image will be scaled to a height of 40px for the top navigation bar and a max. width of 250px for the start page. A scalable graphic is highly recommended.
admin.lookup_mx: Match destination against MX (.outlook.com to route all mail targeted to a MX *.outlook.com over this hop)
admin.merged_vars_hint: Greyed out rows were merged from vars.(local.)inc.php and cannot be modified.
admin.oauth2_info:
The OAuth2 implementation supports the grant type "Authorization Code" and issues refresh tokens.
The server also automatically issues new refresh tokens, after a refresh token has been used.

→ The default scope is profile. Only mailbox users can be authenticated against OAuth2. If the scope parameter is omitted, it falls back to profile.
→ The state parameter is required to be sent by the client as part of the authorize request.

Paths for requests to the OAuth2 API:
  • Authorization endpoint: /oauth/authorize
  • Token endpoint: /oauth/token
  • Resource page: /oauth/profile
Regenerating the client secret will not expire existing authorization codes, but they will fail to renew their token.

Revoking client tokens will cause immediate termination of all active sessions. All clients need to re-authenticate.
admin.quarantine_bcc:
Send a copy of all notifications (BCC) to this recipient:
Leave empty to disable. Unsigned, unchecked mail. Should be delivered internally only.
admin.quarantine_max_age:
Maximum age in days
Value must be equal to or greater than 1 day.
admin.quarantine_max_size:
Maximum size in MiB (larger elements are discarded):
0 does not indicate unlimited.
admin.quarantine_notification_html:
Notification email template:
Leave empty to restore default template.
admin.quarantine_redirect:
Redirect all notifications to this recipient:
Leave empty to disable. Unsigned, unchecked mail. Should be delivered internally only.
admin.queue_ays: Please confirm you want to delete all items from the current queue.
admin.quota_notification_html:
Notification email template:
Leave empty to restore default template.
admin.quota_notifications_info: Quota notications are sent to users once when crossing 80% and once when crossing 95% usage.
admin.quota_notifications_vars:
{{percent}} equals the current quota of the user
{{username}} is the mailbox name
admin.r_info:
Greyed out/disabled elements on the list of active restrictions are not known as valid restrictions to mailcow and cannot be moved. Unknown restrictions will be set in order of appearance anyway.
You can add new elements in inc/vars.local.inc.php to be able to toggle them.
admin.relayhosts_hint:
Define sender-dependent transports to be able to select them in a domains configuration dialog.
The transport service is always "smtp:" and will therefore try TLS when offered. Wrapped TLS (SMTPS) is not supported. A users individual outbound TLS policy setting is taken into account.
Affects selected domains including alias domains.
admin.rsettings_preset_1: Disable all but DKIM and rate limit for authenticated users
admin.rsettings_preset_3: Only allow specific senders for a mailbox (i.e. usage as internal mailbox only)
admin.rspamd-com_settings: A setting name will be auto-generated, please see the example presets below. For more details see Rspamd docs
admin.rspamd_global_filters_info: Global filter maps contain different kind of global black and whitelists.
admin.rspamd_global_filters_regex:
Their names explain their purpose. All content must contain valid regular expression in the format of "/pattern/options" (e.g. /.+@domain\.tld/i).
Although rudimentary checks are being executed on each line of regex, Rspamds functionality can be broken, if it fails to read the syntax correctly.
Rspamd will try to read the map content when changed. If you experience problems, restart Rspamd to enforce a map reload.
admin.subject: Subject
admin.title: Title
admin.transport_dest_format: Syntax: example.org, .example.org, *, box@example.org (multiple values can be comma-separated)
admin.transports_hint:
→ A transport map entry overrules a sender-dependent transport map.
→ Outbound TLS policy settings per-user are ignored and can only be enforced by TLS policy map entries.
→ The transport service for defined transports is always "smtp:" and will therefore try TLS when offered. Wrapped TLS (SMTPS) is not supported.
→ Addresses matching "/localhost$/" will always be transported via "local:", therefore a "*" destination will not apply to those addresses.
→ To determine credentials for an exemplary next hop "[host]:25", Postfix always queries for "host" before searching for "[host]:25". This behavior makes it impossible to use "host" and "[host]:25" at the same time.
admin.ui_header_announcement_help: The announcement is visible for all logged in users and on the login screen of the UI.

debug.log_info:
mailcow in-memory logs are collected in Redis lists and trimmed to LOG_LINES (%d) every minute to reduce hammering.
In-memory logs are not meant to be persistent. All applications that log in-memory, also log to the Docker daemon and therefore to the default logging driver.
The in-memory log type should be used for debugging minor issues with containers.

External logs are collected via API of the given application.

Static logs are mostly activity logs, that are not logged to the Dockerd but still need to be persistent (except for API logs).
debug.solr_dead: Solr is starting, disabled or died.

diagnostics.cname_from_a: Value derived from A/AAAA record. This is supported as long as the record points to the correct resource.
diagnostics.dns_records_24hours: Please note that changes made to DNS may take up to 24 hours to correctly have their current state reflected on this page. It is intended as a way for you to easily see how to configure your DNS records and to check whether all your records are correctly stored in DNS.

edit.automap: Try to automap folders ("Sent items", "Sent" => "Sent" etc.)
edit.bcc_dest_format: BCC destination must be a single valid email address.
edit.comment_info: A private comment is not visible to the user, while a public comment is shown as tooltip when hovering it in a users overview
edit.delete2: Delete messages on destination that are not on source
edit.disable_login: Disallow login (incoming mail is still accepted)
edit.dont_check_sender_acl: Disable sender check for domain %s (+ alias domains)
edit.extended_sender_acl_info:
A DKIM domain key should be imported, if available.
Remember to add this server to the corresponding SPF TXT record.
Whenever a domain or alias domain is added to this server, that overlaps with an external address, the external address is removed.
Use @domain.tld to allow to send as *@domain.tld.
edit.force_pw_update: Force password update at next login
edit.force_pw_update_info: This user will only be able to login to %s.
edit.gal_info: The GAL contains all objects of a domain and cannot be edited by any user. Free/busy information in SOGo is missing, if disabled! Restart SOGo to apply changes.
edit.maxage:
Maximum age of messages in days that will be polled from remote
(0 = ignore age)
edit.mbox_rl_info: This rate limit is applied on the SASL login name, it matches any "from" address used by the logged-in user. A mailbox rate limit overrides a domain-wide rate limit.
edit.pushover_info: Push notification settings will apply to all clean (non-spam) mail delivered to %s including aliases (shared, non-shared, tagged).
edit.pushover_sender_array: Only consider the following sender email addresses <small>(comma-separated)</small>
edit.pushover_vars:
When no sender filter is defined, all mails will be considered.
Regex filters as well as exact sender checks can be defined individually and will be considered sequentially. They do not depend on each other.
Useable variables for text and title (please take note of data protection policies)
edit.relay_all_info: ↪ If you choose not to relay all recipients, you will need to add a ("blind") mailbox for every single recipient that should be relayed.
edit.relay_transport_info:
Info
You can define transport maps for a custom destination for this domain. If not set, a MX lookup will be made.
edit.relay_unknown_only: Relay non-existing mailboxes only. Existing mailboxes will be delivered locally.
edit.sender_acl_info:
If mailbox user A is allowed to send as mailbox user B, the sender address is not automatically displayed as selectable "from" field in SOGo.
Mailbox user B needs to create a delegation in SOGo to allow mailbox user A to select their address as sender. To delegate a mailbox in SOGo, use the menu (three dots) to the right of your mailbox name in the upper left while in mail view. This behaviour does not apply to alias addresses.
edit.skipcrossduplicates: Skip duplicate messages across folders (first come, first serve)
edit.sogo_access_info: Grant or permit access to SOGo. This setting does neither affect access to all other services nor does it delete or change a users existing SOGo profile.
edit.sogo_visible_info: This option only affects objects, that can be displayed in SOGo (shared or non-shared alias addresses pointing to at least one local mailbox). If hidden, an alias will not appear as selectable sender in SOGo.
edit.spam_alias: Create or change time limited alias addresses
edit.spam_policy: Add or remove items to white-/blacklist
edit.subfolder2:
Sync into subfolder on destination
(empty = do not use subfolder)
edit.timeout1: Timeout for connection to remote host
edit.timeout2: Timeout for connection to local host
edit.title: Edit object

footer.delete_these_items: Please confirm your changes to the following object id
footer.hibp_nok: Matched! This is a potentially dangerous password!
footer.restart_container_info: Important: A graceful restart may take a while to complete, please wait for it to finish.
footer.restarting_container: Restarting container, this may take a while

info.session_expires: Your session will expire in about 15 seconds

login.mobileconfig_info: Please login as mailbox user to download the requested Apple connection profile.

mailbox.alias_domain_alias_hint:
별칭은 도메인 별칭에 자동으로 적용되지 않습니다. 예시로, my-alias@domain 와 같은 별칭 주소는 my-alias@alias-domain 에서 오는 메일을 받지 않습니다. ("alias-domain" 이 "domain"의 별칭 도메인인 경우).
필터를 사용해서 외부 메일함에 메일을 전달하는 것을 추천합니다. ("필터" 탭 또는 SOGo -> Forwarder 사용).
mailbox.alias_domain_backupmx: Alias domain inactive for relay domain
mailbox.bcc_info:
BCC maps are used to silently forward copies of all messages to another address. A recipient map type entry is used, when the local destination acts as recipient of a mail. Sender maps conform to the same principle.
The local destination will not be informed about a failed delivery.
mailbox.booking_custom: Hard-limit to a custom amount of bookings
mailbox.booking_lt0: Unlimited, but show as busy when booked
mailbox.recipient_map_info: Recipient maps are used to replace the destination address on a message before it is delivered.
mailbox.recipient_map_new_info: Recipient map destination must be a valid email address.
mailbox.recipient_map_old_info: A recipient maps original destination must be valid email addresses or a domain name.
mailbox.sieve_info:
You can store multiple filters per user, but only one prefilter and one postfilter can be active at the same time.
Each filter will be processed in the described order. Neither a failed script nor an issued "keep;" will stop processing of further scripts. Changes to global sieve scripts will trigger a restart of Dovecot.

Global sieve prefilter → Prefilter → User scripts → Postfilter → Global sieve postfilter
mailbox.sieve_preset_1: Discard mail with probable dangerous file types
mailbox.sieve_preset_2: Always mark the e-mail of a specific sender as seen
mailbox.sieve_preset_3: Discard silently, stop all further sieve processing
mailbox.sieve_preset_4: File into INBOX, skip further processing by sieve filters
mailbox.sieve_preset_8: Discard message sent to an alias address the sender is part of
mailbox.sieve_preset_header: Please see the example presets below. For more details see Wikipedia.
mailbox.sogo_allow_admin_hint: Administrative SOGo logins are only available for mailboxes with an existing SOGo profile. A user must have been logged in to SOGo at least once.
mailbox.tls_map_parameters_info: Empty or parameters, for example: protocols=!SSLv2 ciphers=medium exclude=3DES
mailbox.tls_policy_maps_info:
This policy map overrides outgoing TLS transport rules independently of a users TLS policy settings.
Please check the "smtp_tls_policy_maps" docs for further information.
mailbox.tls_policy_maps_enforced_tls: These policies will also override the behaviour for mailbox users that enforce outgoing TLS connections. If no policy exists below, these users will apply the default values specified as smtp_tls_mandatory_protocols and smtp_tls_mandatory_ciphers.

oauth2.access_denied: Please login as mailbox owner to grant access via OAuth2.
oauth2.profile_desc: View personal information: username, full name, created, modified, active
oauth2.scope_ask_permission: An application asked for the following permissions

quarantine.disabled_by_config: 현재 시스템 설정에 따라 검역소가 비활성화 되었습니다. "메일함당 유치할 메일 수" 과 "최대 크기" 를 설정하여 검역소를 활성화할 수 있습니다.
quarantine.qhandler_success: 요청을 시스템에 성공적으로 보냈습니다. 이 창을 닫아도 좋습니다.
quarantine.qinfo:
검역소 시스템은 거부된 메일을 데이터베이스에 저장하는 동시에 발신자는 메일 발송이 실패했다는 신호를 받습니다.
"스팸으로 배우고 삭제"는 Bayesian theorem를 통하여 해당 메일을 스팸으로 배우고, 추후에 오는 비슷한 메세지를 거부할 수 있도록 fuzzy hash를 생성합니다.
사용하고 있는 시스템에 따라서 다수의 메세지를 학습하는데 오랜 시간이 걸릴 수 있습니다.
quarantine.release_body: 이 메세지에 당신의 메세지가 eml 파일로 첨부되어 있습니다.

start.imap_smtp_server_auth_info:
Please use your full email address and the PLAIN authentication mechanism.
Your login data will be encrypted by the server-side mandatory encryption.
start.mailcow_apps_detail: Use a mailcow app to access your mails, calendar, contacts and more.
start.mailcow_panel_detail:
Domain administrators create, modify or delete mailboxes and aliases, change domains and read further information about their assigned domains.
Mailbox users are able to create time-limited aliases (spam aliases), change their password and spam filter settings.

user.aliases_send_as_all: Do not check sender access for the following domain(s) and its alias domains
user.app_hint:
앱 비밀번호는 IMAP과 SMTP에 로그인할 수 있는 대체 비밀번호입니다. 사용자명은 변하지 않습니다.
SOGo (ActiveSync 포함) 는 앱 비밀번호로 접근할 수 없습니다.
user.apple_connection_profile_complete: 이 연결 프로필은 Apple 기기를 위한 IMAP과 SMTP 설정, CalDAV (캘린더) 와 CardDAV (연락처) 경로를 포함하고 있습니다.
user.apple_connection_profile_mailonly: 이 연결 프로필은 Apple 기기를 위한 IMAP과 SMTP 설정을 포함하고 있습니다.
user.client_configuration: 이메일 클라이언트와 스마트폰을 위한 계정 설정 가이드 보기
user.direct_aliases_desc: Direct alias addresses are affected by spam filter and TLS policy settings.
user.eas_reset_help:
대부분의 경우에는 기기 캐시 초기화가 망가진 ActiveSync 프로필을 복구하는데 도움을 줍니다.
경고: 모든 요소들이 다시 다운로드됩니다!
user.force_pw_update: 그룹웨어 관련 서비스에 접근하기 위해서는 새 비밀번호를 꼭 설정해야 합니다.
user.new_password_description: 요구 사항: 최소 6자리의 숫자와 문자의 조합.
user.pushover_info: 푸시 알림 설정은 스팸이 아닌 모든 메일에 적용되며, %s과 이 이메일의 별칭으로 메일을 받았을 때 알람이 전송됩니다.
user.pushover_sender_array: 다음 주소로부터 온 메일들에 대해서만 알림 보내기 <small>(쉼표로 구분)</small>
user.pushover_vars:
송신자 필터가 정의되지 않으면 모든 메일에 대해서 알림을 보냅니다.
정규식 필터와 송신자 확인은 독립적으로 정의할 수 있으며, 이 순서대로 확인합니다. 이 둘은 서로에게 의존하지 않습니다.
알림 제목과 내용을 위한 사용 가능한 변수 (데이터 보호 정책을 참고하세요)
user.quarantine_notification_info: 알림이 보내지면 해당 항목은 "알림 보냄" 이라고 표시되며, 해당 항목에 대한 알림은 더 이상 보내지 않습니다.
user.shared_aliases_desc: 공동 사용 메일 별칭은 스팸 필터, 암호화 등 사용자의 설정의 영향을 받지 않습니다. 해당 주소의 스팸 필터는 관리자가 도메인 정책 형식으로 만들어야만 적용됩니다.
user.sogo_profile_reset_help: 이는 사용자의 SOGo 프로필을 삭제하고 캘린더와 연락처도 같이 삭제합니다!.
user.spamfilter_bl_desc: 블랙리스트에 등록된 발신자로부터 온 메일들은 무조건 스팸으로 분류되고 메일이 거부됩니다. 와일드카드를 이용할 수 있습니다. 필터는 1대1로 대응하는 이메일 별칭에만 적용되며, catch-all 형식의 별칭과 메일함 자체는 제외합니다.
user.spamfilter_hint: 첫 값은 "낮은 스팸 점수" 기준이고, 두 번째 값은 "높은 스팸 점수" 기준입니다..
user.spamfilter_red: 빨강: 이 메일을 스팸으로 취급하고, 서버가 해당 메일을 거부합니다.
user.spamfilter_wl_desc: 화이트리스트에 등록된 메일로부터 온 메세지들은 절대로 스팸으로 분류되지 않습니다. 와일드카드를 사용할 수 있습니다. 필터는 1대1로 대응하는 이메일 별칭에만 적용되며, catch-all 형식의 별칭과 메일함 자체는 제외합니다.
user.spamfilter_yellow: 노랑: 이 메세지는 스팸일 수 있으며, 메일이 스팸함으로 이동합니다.
user.tag_handling: 태그가 있는 메일 처리 방식 설정
user.tag_help_example: 태그가 있는 이메일 주소의 예시: me+Facebook@example.org
user.tag_help_explain:
하위 폴더로 이동: INBOX 아래에 태그와 같은 이름을 가진 새 하위 폴더를 생성합니다. ("INBOX/Facebook").
제목에 추가: 태그가 메일 제목 앞에 추가됩니다. 예시: "[Facebook] 새 소식".
user.title: 제목
user.tls_policy_warning:
경고: 메일 전송에 TLS를 무조건 적용하게 되면, 메일을 잃을 수 있습니다.
이 정책을 충종하지 않는 메세지는 거부되며, 메일 시스템은 이를 hard fail로 분류합니다.
이 옵션은 사용자의 메인 메일 (로그인할 때 쓰는 메일), 별칭 도메인으로부터 나온 모든 메일 주소와 현재 메일함만을 가진 별칭 메일 주소에만 적용됩니다.

warning.domain_added_sogo_failed: Added domain but failed to restart SOGo, please check your server logs.
warning.dovecot_restart_failed: Dovecot failed to restart, please check the logs
warning.hash_not_found: Hash not found or already deleted
warning.quota_exceeded_scope: Domain quota exceeded: Only unlimited mailboxes can be created in this domain scope.
warning.session_ua: Form token invalid: User-Agent validation error
